explanation: [0-0] In front of a black background, a man wearing a black shirt and a black baseball cap stares down with wide eyes and an open mouth. In front of him is a table with a stove on it. On the stove is a black pan with some oil in it. To the left, a light blue bowl contains egg liquid. Other kitchen utensils are also on the table.
[0-2] First, the man in black pours the egg liquid from the bowl into the pan with his right hand, filling the entire bottom of the pan.
[0-2] First, the man in black pours the egg liquid from the bowl into the pan with his right hand, filling the entire bottom of the pan.

[2-12] Then the shot changes, the pan is shaking up and down, a pair of chopsticks on the right quickly stir the egg liquid, the chopsticks knock on the right side of the pan, the shot changes, a pink spatula on the right lifts the fried egg skin from the edge of the pan and folds it up to form a semi-circular omelet, then turns the omelet over and places it in the pan.
